meanings.definition: A brand name for a transparent thermoplastic material.
meanings.sent1: The shop window was made of perspex, allowing customers to see the products clearly.
meanings.sent2: The artist used perspex to create a beautiful sculpture that caught the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: When the magician pulled a rabbit out of the hat made of perspex, the audience gasped in surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like perspex, transparent and easily broken by harsh words.
meanings.sent5: The perspex block glowed in the sunlight, casting colorful reflections around the room.

meanings.definition: A type of plastic sheeting used for various applications.
meanings.sent1: The greenhouse roof was covered with perspex to protect the plants from the cold.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers used perspex to create a temporary barrier around the site.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the perspex sheet was an invisible force field, keeping them safe from imaginary monsters.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like perspex, clear and unbreakable even in tough times.
meanings.sent5: The perspex sheet shimmered in the moonlight, creating a magical atmosphere in the garden.
